Notes.Text:
This update for netatalk fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-1160 Fixed a missing bounds check in the handling of the DSI
  OPEN SESSION request, which allowed an unauthenticated to overwrite memory
  with data of their choice leading for arbitrary code execution with root
  privileges. (bsc#1119540)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4

Vulnerabilities.Description: Netatalk before 3.1.12 is vulnerable to an out of bounds write in dsi_opensess.c. This is due to lack of bounds checking on attacker controlled data. A remote unauthenticated attacker can leverage this vulnerability to achieve arbitrary code execution.
